name: Revirc
description:
Revirc is my first 32 pixel character.

I drew it with reference to the Sacriers from Dofus (french game). It's a project that still needs improvement, like: an idle animation, walking/running animation, and I would also like to add attack animations in the future.

This is an Aseprite file and 8 png file containing the character cardinal directions.
It's free and I only posted it to serve as my first project ever made! Have fun using it and show me what you did!.
